other_title: La Grande Avventura Del Principe Valiant (Italian)
Las aventuras de Hols, el príncipe del sol (Spanish)
Las Aventuras de Hols: El Príncipe del Sol (Spanish)
Prince of the Sun: The Great Adventure of Horus
Principe de la Espada del Sol, El (Spanish)
Taiyō no Ōji - Hols no Daibōken (Japanese)
The Adventures of Hols, Prince of the Sun
The Great Adventure of Little Prince Valiant
太陽の王子　ホルスの大冒険 (Japanese)
plot: As a baby, Horus was saved by his father from their burning northern village, after the village was attacked by a powerful demon. Several years pass, and on his deathbed the father bids Horus to return to his people. Horus goes on a journey and quickly finds a village plagued by a monster. After slaying the monster, he one day finds, in another ruined village, a cute girl, singing in a heavenly voice. He brings the girl to his new home, but soon finds that there was a good reason for her being alone in the wasteland...
